imdb.plot outline: Join martial arts guru Chris Crudelli for Fight Clubs, the action packed, adrenaline pumping adventure where he pushes his mind and body to the limit. Heading to the birthplace of capoeira, Chris has only one week of training with a master before taking on the local champion in a full contact fight. It is not just about blood, sweat and fighting. It is also about getting immersed in the culture, magic and traditions that surround this unique Brazilian martial art.
imdb.title: Chris Crudelli's Fight Club
plot: Join martial arts guru Chris Crudelli for Fight Clubs, the action packed, adrenaline pumping adventure where he pushes his mind and body to the limit. Heading to the birthplace of capoeira, Chris has only one week of training with a master before taking on the local champion in a full contact fight. It is not just about blood, sweat and fighting. It is also about getting immersed in the culture, magic and traditions that surround this unique Brazilian martial art.
